Package ohos.nfc.tag

Class NfcVTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.nfc.tag.TagManager
      • ohos.nfc.tag.NfcVTag

  • public class NfcVTag
extends TagManager
    Provides methods for creating an NFC-V tag, obtaining tag information, and controlling tag read and write.

    This class inherits from the TagManager abstract class.

    Since:
    5
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Communication#NFC

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Optional<NfcVTag> getInstance​(TagInfo tagInfo)
        Obtains an NfcVTag instance for the given tag.

        You can call this method to obtain an NfcVTag instance only if the given tag supports NFC-V.

        Parameters:
        tagInfo - Indicates information about the given tag.
        Returns:
        Returns the NfcVTag instance.
        Since:
        5

      • getResponseFlags

        public byte getResponseFlags​()
        Obtains the response flags from this NfcVTag instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the response flags.
        Since:
        5

        public byte getDsfId​()
        Obtains the data storage format identifier (DSFID) from this NfcVTag instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the DSFID.
        Since:
        5
